long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your API Documentation Experience! 

Tired of dealing with cumbersome and hard-to-navigate Swagger documentation? 

Upgrade your API documentation experience with Swagger Made Simple, the ultimate Chrome extension that seamlessly redirects you from the default Swagger documentation page to our enhanced and user-friendly viewer.


Automatic Redirection: 
Instantly redirects you from the traditional Swagger documentation page to our improved Swagger Made Simple viewer. 

Enhanced Usability: 
Enjoy a cleaner, more intuitive interface designed to make understanding API documentation effortless. 

Improved Navigation: 
Quickly find the information you need with a streamlined layout and advanced search capabilities. 

Consistent Formatting: 
Experience uniform and easy-to-read documentation across all your API projects. 

Fast Loading Times: 
Get the information you need faster with our optimized documentation viewer.


How It Works: 

Install the Extension: 
Add Swagger Made Simple to your Chrome browser with a single click. 

Automatic Redirection:
Whenever you navigate to a Swagger documentation page, you'll be automatically redirected to our improved viewer. 

Enjoy Enhanced Documentation: 
Benefit from a superior API documentation experience without any extra effort.

Say goodbye to the frustration of poorly designed Swagger documentation and say hello to Swagger Made Simple. 

Transform the way you interact with API documentation today! Install Now and Revolutionize Your API Documentation Experience!
